Uses of Package
org.numenta.nupic.encoders

  • Packages that use org.numenta.nupic.encoders 
    Package Description
    org.numenta.nupic.encoders  
    org.numenta.nupic.research  
    org.numenta.nupic.unit.encoders  
  • Classes in org.numenta.nupic.encoders used by org.numenta.nupic.encoders 
    Class and Description
    Decode
    Tuple to contain the results of an Encoder's decoded values.
    DecodeTuple
    Subclass of Tuple to specifically contain the results of an Encoder's Encoder.encode(org.numenta.nupic.research.Connections, double) call.
    Encoder 
    EncoderResult
    Tuple to represent the results of computations in different forms.
    Ranges
    Convenience subclass of Tuple to contain the list of ranges expressed for a particular decoded output of an Encoder by using tightly constrained types without the verbosity at the instantiation site.
    RangeTuple
    Subclasses the Tuple utility class to constrain the number of arguments and argument types to those specifically related to the Encoder functionality.
  • Classes in org.numenta.nupic.encoders used by org.numenta.nupic.research 
    Class and Description
    Encoder 
  • Classes in org.numenta.nupic.encoders used by org.numenta.nupic.unit.encoders 
    Class and Description
    ScalarEncoder
    DOCUMENTATION TAKE DIRECTLY FROM THE PYTHON VERSION: A scalar encoder encodes a numeric (floating point) value into an array of bits.
